description.lang: The 5 outlets power strip provides five Z-Wave outlets for remote controlled by controller through Z-Wave gateway for internet of thing service and can be configured in Z-Wave sensor network, if Z-Wave certified controller features remote access, you can now control five outlets from your mobile phone each one. Five outlets canmanual On/Off the same time by push button. The two USB ports provide 5V/2.1A charging power for MP3/ mobile phone.etc..

deviceDescription.productName: 5 Outlet Power Strip with USB charger
